descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is pleased to offer this luxurious 5-bedroom villa in Millennium Estates, Meydan gated community. This elegant unit features 5 bedrooms laid out with parquet flooring, 7 bathrooms, large living and dining area, maid's room and separate driver's room. Kitchen is fully equipped with Poggen Pohl appliances.
* 5 Bedrooms
* BUA: 7,200 sq.ft.
* Plot: 9,800 sq.ft.
* 7 Bathrooms
* Community views
* Single row
* Separate maid's and driver's quarter
* Fully equipped kitchen
* 2 Parking spaces
Features and amenities:
* Playground
* Community park
* Walking trail
* Near Meydan hotel
* Near Mosque
Millennium Estates represents a visionary attempt to evoke and inspire the spirit of true community living. This high-end project comprises 198 luxury villas built over 3.8 million sq.ft. Inspired by international architectural designs, every villa is an embodiment of form, function and sheer refinement. With 3 different types of properties to choose from, you can find a villa that best suits your taste and lifestyle."]
